Release Notes:
What's New
  • Functionality update to display the users' Full Name within the Rebuild Alert List
  • Functionality update to update the authorization form to display the current COR3 logo
  • Functionality update to add Release Notes link to the DRS Header
  • Functionality update to remove Priority and Deadline columns from the To Do List and Watch List
  • Functionality update to show the Document Name and Document File Name within the Document Name column of the Documents tab
  • Functionality update display new style on DRS BPM Login screen
Bug Fixes
  • Updates to allow the user to edit the Document Name field and input up to 100 characters within Document management
  • Update to allow the user to edit the Author field within Document management

What's New
  • Functionality updated to Application Intake Dashboard to Include 'Date Submitted to COR3'
  • Functionality updated to modify the screen layout for 5% Project Management Costs UI screen
  • Functionality updates to add additional user to COR3 Review Email Notifications

Bug Fix
  • Modified view in the Dashboard to match Cost.

What's New
  • Functionality update to integrate CIM Invoices into RFR Batch
  • Functionality update to consolidate sub-recipient permissions for RFR


Data Updates

  • Update to associate expenses to RFR
  • Update Funding Bucket value to invoices
  • Update missing Paid Dates to RFR Payments
  • Edit PRDOH RFR Note Language

What's New
  • Display Pending PW Versions
    • Display upcoming versions not yet obligated on the Version History tab
    • Add new "Latest Obligated Version" filed on PW version History tab
    • Add new Review Status field to the main grid on the PW Version History tab
    • Updated calculation for Project Amount and Obligated Amount to be a running total on the main grid
  • Project Cost Code Category Mapping
    • Completed initial mapping of Project Costs to Category based on historical data
    • Add New Cost Category field to Project Cost Database Table
    • Updated edit project cost action to only allow adding new cost line items and editing only the project cost category for existing project cost line items
    • Updated the Code field in Project Cost Lines to display the actual FEMA Code
  • ADM
    • Updated ADM to generate small payment request automatically at closeout stages
    • Updated ADM to map Project Costs to Categories
  • Role Consolidation
    • Update DRS_Subrecipient and DRS_Subrecipient RO to see the FEMA PA Applicant Dashboard
    • Completed removal of old roles and assignment of new roles to all sub recipient users.
Bug Fixes
  • Resolved an issue where the COR3 PW Obligation Notification was not sending
Data Updates
  • Update Cost Share percentage of PW folder 4339-FPA-PW-000002299 to be updated 100%

What's New:
  • Functionality for "Consult" checkbox within the Site Profile to be leveraged when inspectors have to meet with the homeowner for more information after the initial inspection was performed 

Bug Fix:
  • Fix for SOW Dashboard to display details under any line item for a Site ID 72-16061 and future sites with the same condition

What's New
  • New ETL process to load FIDA_Amendments file data to DRS_DW
  • Table conversion to migrate historical FIDA_Amendments data stored within PR_DW to DRS_DW
  • Ingestion of tables from MetastormV9 DB to data warehouse DRS_DW hist schema
  • Creation of a Historical View of Grants Portal Projects for Reporting in DRS_DW.
Updates
  • Update to DRS_DW GP_Applicants ETL to reflect new file layout from FEMA

What's New
• Functionality update to allow CR duplication "splitting" for CRs with multiple release dates.
• Update to CR Watch List Email Distribution List.
• Update to CRs in BA Manager queue to move along the CR process.
• Bulk update for CRs missing LOE data

What's New
  • Functionality update to provide users the ability to Edit documents associated to legacy children folders at the damage level/folder.

What's New
• Re-Architecture of Collaboration Portal Administration & HMGP Sub-Sites/Libraries
• Re-Architecture of Collaboration Portal Community Service Sub-Site/Libraries
• New FEMA-EHP Subsite

What's New
  • Functionality allows the user to view the Full Name of the selected user
  • Functionality allows the user to view the updated Subject (SubApplicant- Entry Date - Sector-Project Type) associated with the 404 Opportunity

Bug Fixes
  • Removes  records that are stuck in "pending" status.
